settings.content:
Kouboo offers an ever-evolving collection of distinctive and original home
décor creations as well as easy interior decorating tips for refreshing the look of your home. If natural decor is what you are looking for, you have come to the right place.

settings.title: Kouboo, Unique Home Decor
settings.subtitle: Shop our one-of-a-kind artisan products made from natural materials and sourced from around the world.

settings.title: Browse
settings.subtitle: Table top and kitchen accessories that are too beautiful and functional.

settings.title: Illuminate
settings.subtitle: Our signature lighting collection is made with raw materials for an elegant appeal inspired by nature.

settings.title: Inviting
settings.subtitle: Soft, neutral shades create a welcoming ambience for any occasion.

settings.title: Organize
settings.subtitle: Charming Woven Baskets for all your Storage Solutions

settings.title: Update
settings.subtitle: Exotic Accents Effortlessly Elevate the look of a Bathroom

settings.newsletter_text: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more …

settings.title: Customer Testimonial
settings.testimonial: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nullam quam enim, fringilla ut purus ut, pretium ullamcorper sem. In sit amet vestibulum tellus. Aenean gravida dolor eget mi bibendum semper.

settings.title: Customer Testimonial
settings.testimonial: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nullam quam enim, fringilla ut purus ut, pretium ullamcorper sem. In sit amet vestibulum tellus. Aenean gravida dolor eget mi bibendum semper.

settings.on_collection_desc: When you introduce Kouboo’s kitchen accessories and tabletop decor to your home, there will never be a lull in conversation again. Treat your family and guests to the singularly unique style and centuries-old craftsmanship, found in carefully shaped serving plates and bowls, decorative wicker placemats, napkin rings, and out-of-the-ordinary kitchen decor. Add warmth, color, and ambiance to your tabletop with handwoven kitchen placemats, decorative rattan coasters and servingware, and other kitchen decoration accessories.

Enjoy the versatility of the featured hand-woven serving trays with their detailed craftsmanship and robust build. These wicker and rattan serving trays with handles are the perfect carriers of various items from the kitchen to the tabletop, easy to transform into a beautiful centerpiece, and a starting point for room decorations. Shop for round and rectangle serving trays and serveware, both decorative and functional!
Combine functionality with beauty by organizing your utensils and bottles in caddies and baskets. These accessories hand woven from rattan also make for fine kitchen décor.

Utilitarian beauty is what these square, rectangular, and round woven placemats and plate covers are all about. Our rattan placemats and picnic food covers offer protection for your tabletop and plates as much as they beautify your tablescape.
Add a touch of refinement to your tabletop with these accessories that will not go unnoticed. Your care for details with refined seashell and rattan napkin rings makes all the difference.

Make decorative lighting the actual epicenter of your home decor! Proper lighting makes your home furnishing, with all its details, shine and sets the desired mood for the respective space. Our chandeliers, wicker lamps, woven pendant lights, hand made from various seashells as well as woven vines and fibers, become a decorative highlight while illuminating what is surrounding them.

Our capiz shell chandeliers dazzle, and each of the round shells of capiz pendants glistens even before you flip the switch. Grand but not intimidating, they are of timeless elegance. If you like the feel of the coast or the tropics, seashell chandeliers will bring it right into your home. Introduce immediate sophistication into your interior with a capiz shell hanging lamp, and you will find yourself admiring it each time you look up.

Perfectly sized for side tables in your living-, family- or bedroom our lamps stand out with delicately executed, traditional craftmanship. The patterns of the seashells or the vines and fibers are even more intriguing when lit in the dark.

Sculptured and formed from organic materials, our rattan & wicker ceiling lights introduce a naturalistic element to any room. Browse rattan lamp shades and contemporary pendant lights, handcrafted from seashells, fibers, and vines, showcasing earthy glamour.

Sculptural objects is  what our floor lamps should be called. While being the source of warm ambient light, they are decorative centerpieces crafted by hand following the traditions of their origin. The artisan character enhances their artistic flair. None is exactly the same.

Given the amount of time we all spend in bathrooms, isn’t it time we introduced these rooms to some contemporary bathroom accessories and decor? Combine a beautifully woven wicker laundry basket with a pristine rattan soap dispenser or soap dish, and a rattan tissue dispenser from Kouboo’s selection of bathroom decor items to give the room the chic and cozy accents it deserves. With a focus on natural materials, created one at a time in a craftsman’s hands, these bathroom items will transform your home into an orderly, serene retreat.

The renaissance of the bathroom doesn't stop at fixtures, it includes bathroom accessories too. Placing a wicker hamper, bamboo, and rattan laundry basket, a decorative laundry hamper with a lid, or a seagrass hamper into your bathroom will add a note of warmth and worldliness to your bathroom decor. A woven hamper, especially a rolling hamper, makes for an ideal, easy-to-use laundry and other item storage.

The need for bathroom wastebaskets is undeniable. Why not turn the necessity into an opportunity to elevate the style of your bathroom décor with a handwoven bamboo or rattan wicker wastebasket? Our collection of high-quality wicker wastebaskets with a lid and other decorative bathroom wastebaskets is designed to work just as well in offices, bedrooms, and laundry rooms.

Would you like to embellish your bathroom style with fashionable accessories? Kouboo has what you are looking for! We offer a wide selection of rattan bathroom accessories made from renewable raw materials that make them the most sustainable choice for your bathroom. Bringing natural rattan bath accessories into your bathroom is a simple and effective way to improve your well-being while remaining environmentally friendly. Look through our range of woven bathroom accessories and bring the outside in!
Our decorative wall mirrors are crafted by master artisans using materials and techniques that are native to their origin in Southeast Asia creating works of art in the own right.

Here's your opportunity to turn the usual home decor ideas using picture frame ornaments, votive candle holders, throw pillows into unique home accessories. Whether it's woven, crafted of wood, chiseled from stone, or one-of-a-kind room decoration pieced together with native shells, items you find here will make great accents for home and garden.

Decorating with wall mirrors adds instant sophistication and depth to any room. What a magnificent statement piece to your interior design a decorative mirror can become! Set a unique accent to your home décor with capiz seashell mirrors and rattan mirrors, designed for coastal-inspired living as well as the urban exotic home.

As the name says these pieces take center stage as home accessories due to their sheer beauty or as a base unit to build your decorating idea upon. Made either from pewter, wood, seashells or rattan and wicker these center pieces combine so easily with a variety of interiors.

When you get organised, it's amazing how much of an impact it can have on your overall well-being. Transform your home from cluttered to serene with stylish and functional woven baskets. Whether you use them for storage or as decorative accents, Kouboo's rattan and wicker baskets fit almost any aesthetic. Our useful woven baskets are available in a variety of styles, sizes, and materials, so you can easily incorporate storage into your decor. Whether you are packing away summer bedding or rethinking your kitchen pantry, the right rattan baskets can make all the difference!

Tired of clutter and knick-knacks that are scattered around and make your home look messy? Look no further as our wicker storage baskets are the perfect storage solution that will help you organize and not detract from the style and aesthetics of your home. Our rattan, wicker, and seagrass storage baskets are available in a variety of shapes and sizes to meet all your storage needs. With everything from toilet paper holders to natural storage baskets to stair storage, you're sure to find something to suit your home.
A nice looking rattan or bamboo magazine rack is an invitation to anyone  sit down, relax and feel at home. Banish the stacks by using these handy yet beautiful containers.
Much easier than repotting your indoor plants is to hide the pot in a handmade cachepot made from rattan, wicker, bamboo or seagrass. Your indoor garden will appear transformed.

These wicker organizers prove that being organized is easy to achieve with the right tool. Whether holding stationary and pens in your home office, art supplies for your child’s project or used as a valet at the entrance, the combination of a wicker basket with a denim saddle makes for an unique and elegant organizing solution.
Place your dripping umbrella in a stand that you won't have to hide in the darkest corner of your foyer. Our umbrella stand blends in incely into a carefully decorated entrance.

Refine your living space with a wide range of indoor rattan furniture items, guaranteed to look on-trend for years to come. Handmade furniture, woven from rattan, makes for the perfect sunroom furniture, introducing comfort and elegance. Whether you wish to furnish the whole room with a full rattan furniture set or get a show-stopping centerpiece, Kouboo's handcrafted furniture is a perfect balance between country chic and modern minimalism, effortlessly adding a touch of elegance to any indoor space!

Rattan accent tables are a classic choice of furniture that fits in various interior styles. If you are searching for a unique piece to match your room decor, a wicker coffee table will be a stylish and functional addition. Choose from a collection of rattan tables by Kouboo and enjoy coastal, tropical bliss all year long.

Intricately hand-crafted wicker headboards by Kouboo visually replicate ocean movements that weave into beautiful, tropical flower petals, blossoming off your bed frame. Designs vary from sunflower and wave-inspired sets to peacock headboards - choose a color and design that completes your bedroom. Rattan headboards available in twin, full, queen, and king sizes.

Elevate your dining experience with wicker chairs, crafted from naturally grown rattan by a team of skilled artisans. Rattan chairs in contemporary coastal styling are suitable for any room. The gorgeous texture created by the organic rattan weave makes a wicker chair the ideal stand-out piece to complement your home. Browse rattan armchairs, lounge or hanging rattan chairs, or select a set of wicker dining chairs to place by your kitchen table, and enjoy their unique, artistic look as well as coziness and comfort.

With breakfast bars and dining counters more popular than ever, bar stools have quickly become a kitchen essential. Raise a glass at the home bar or kitchen counter while resting comfortably atop the design-conscious, clean-line style of Kouboo's rattan stools. Whether you are looking for Scandinavian minimalism or a more decorative look, you will find a range of rattan bar stools that blend seamlessly with any decor. Kouboo's gorgeous woven stools are artisan-made, making any rattan stool from our collection the ideal stand-out piece to complement your kitchen. Create a place where people belong and enjoy their time together by purchasing functional counter, kitchen or bar stools!

Organize scattered toys, books, and other clutter in lovely and practical kids' toy storage baskets. Besides keeping your living room, kids’ room, or nursery tidy, Kouboo's unique handcrafted wicker and rattan toy baskets work as chic design elements to fit your home décor. Choose from the collection of intricately woven kids' storage baskets and store your child's toys neatly.

Kouboo's selection of natural rattan nightstands is designed to showcase how detailed and wonderful wicker nightstands and bedside tables can be. Browse a collection of handcrafted rustic nightstands with drawers and open shelf nightstands to enhance your bedroom, study, family room, or sun porch.

Browse a collection of rattan dining room chairs to enhance your dining room setup. The gorgeous texture created by the organic rattan weave makes woven dining chairs the ideal stand-out pieces for your dining room table, kitchen island, living room, or sunroom dining area. Introduce coastal chic to your home with modern rattan dining chairs, handmade by Kouboo's skilled artisans.

Give your table setting a unique character and coastal flair with Kouboo's rattan and wooden serveware for indoor and outdoor use – a collection of decorative serving bowls and platters, hand-woven from rattan and hand-carved from teak wood.

There's a reason why the peacock chair has never really gone out of fashion, its lightweight but sturdy frame gives a certain luxury feel for both the room and the person sitting on this throne. A high-back peacock chair also referred to as the Manila or Philippine chair will be a great addition to any sunroom and will leave a substantial first impression on anyone who walks into your house. Discover Kouboo's unique, luxurious, and hand-made rattan peacock chairs that are perfect for your boho or eclectic style interior!

settings.on_ebay_description: Add warmth to your home by hanging this ceiling light over your dining room table, your kitchen bar, your family or your children's bedroom. The earthy, natural appearance of the hand woven wicker makes all the difference.
settings.on_product_tabs_content:
Details

  • Clean with damp cloth.
  • Do not leave exposed to the elements.
  • Don't use as a trivet.
settings.on_product_tabs_content2:
Shipping Info

FREE! Yes, that’s right. All items ship free of charge. It will take between 2-5 days depending on where you are located in order to receive your order.

If you are in a rush we offer faster shipping options at a surcharge. Our real time calculator is at your disposal during the checkout process and will quote overnight options as well as 2nd and 3rd day shipping.
settings.on_product_tabs_content3:
Returns

*100% Satisfaction Guaranteed

We want you to be absolutely happy with any KOUBOO item you have purchased or received as a gift. If you are dissatisfied for any reason, please return the item within 30 days for a full refund. Refunds do not include rush-shipping charges should you have opted to expedite your order.

We cover the shipping cost for the return in case we make a mistake. Products that get damaged in shipping will be replaced at our expense. Please understand that items that are on SALE cannot be returned.

To return your KOUBOO purchase please send us the product back in its original packaging with the appropriate amount of padding. You might want to consider adding insurance when shipping your purchase back to us in case it gets lost or damaged in transit. These are merely recommendations in order to ensure the full refund.

Send the product you wish to return to

Eleets 3PL/KOUBOO
2430 South Grand Avenue
Carson, CA 90810

Phone: 714-426-4255 ( Note, this is not a customer service line ) 

Once the return is sent we would appreciate if you called us at 1-888-272 0705 between the hours of 9AM and 5PM Pacific Time (Mon - Fri) or IF you sent an e-mail to info@kouboo.com with your order number for us to know that it is on its way. The refund will be issued upon receipt and inspection of the returned merchandise.

RESTOCKING FEE & EXCLUSION: For chandeliers and lamps a restocking fee of 20% of the sales price may apply pending on condition of returned lightng fixture. Chandeliers and lamps that have been mounted and connected cannot be returned. A restocking fee of 20% also applies for items not returned in their original packaging. Call us or send us an e-mail for more information.

settings.on_ebay_description: Kouboo's La Jolla rectangular dinner napkin and guest towel holder is nothing short of classy elegance for your home! It's so pretty the honey-brown woven basket becomes a beautiful accessory in the kitchen or bath. Due to it's size, with a little creativity, it can be used for any number of storage possibilities in the office, den or craft room also.

settings.on_product_tabs_content:

settings.on_ebay_description:
Square Tissue Box Cover - A pretty accent for any room, this rattan tissue box cover is hand woven in Hapao style, which refers to the technique of alternating the color from a light natural to dark mocha when weaving the rattan peel over the rattan vine.  This honey-brown rattan tissue box cover holds a standard cube-sized tissue box.


Caution: Not all tissue boxes are created equal. Please measure the tissue boxes you are using and compare with the measurements of the tissue box cover hereafter to verify that one will fit into the other.

Returns

*100% Satisfaction Guaranteed

We want you to be absolutely happy with any KOUBOO item you have purchased or received as a gift. If you are dissatisfied for any reason, please return the item within 30 days for a full refund. Refunds do not include rush-shipping charges should you have opted to expedite your order.

  • Splash water proof. Do not let it stand in puddle of water for long periods of time.
  • Bottle made from ceramic.
  • Weighs less than 1 LBS.

settings.title: Can I order by fax?
settings.subtitle: We are sorry for not being able to receive order by fax. Should you not be able to place your order on our website, please don’t hesitate to give us a call at 1-888-272 0705 between 9AM and 5PM Pacific Time (MON-FRI).

settings.title: Can I order by telephone?
settings.subtitle: Absolutely. We are available to take your order between 9AM and 5PM Pacific Time (MON-FRI) . Just call us at 1-888-272 0705.

settings.title: Do you have a wedding registry?
settings.subtitle: We currently do not have a wedding registry, but we offer gift shipping which would enable a donor of yours to place an order online and have it shipped to your address.

settings.title: Do you offer gift cards?
settings.subtitle: We offer e-gift cards, a convenient and fast way to deliver a present to anyone you wish to surprise. To learn more about our gift card program you can always navigate to the bottom of any page on our website and click Gift Cards.

settings.title: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.subtitle: We gladly accept Master Card, Visa, Discover, American Express and PayPal.

settings.title: Will you hold an order and ship it at a later stage?
settings.subtitle: We are sorry but an order made online cannot be held. However if you wish to delay shipment you may place your order by phone. Please call us at 1-888-272 0705 between 9AM and 5PM Pacific Time (MON-FRI).

settings.title: Can an order be shipped to a P.O. Box?
settings.subtitle: Unfortunately no order can be delivered to a P.O. Box in order for you and us to be able to track your shipment. Shipments to military AFB are possible however.

settings.title: Can orders be shipped to Canada?
settings.subtitle: We are sorry, but at this point we cannot ship orders to Canada.

settings.title: Can orders be shipped to foreign countries?
settings.subtitle: We are sorry, but at this point we cannot ship orders to any other country but the USA.

settings.title: Do you offer rush delivery?
settings.subtitle: Yes, we offer 3rd day, 2nd day and overnight delivery at an additional cost. The cost of shipping is calculated real time based on the ship-to ZIP code you enter when checking out. Orders must be placed before 2PM Pacific Time.

settings.title: Do you ship to Alasaka and Hawaii?
settings.subtitle: We do ship to Alaska and Hawaii. Alaska and Hawaii are unfortuntely excluded form our FREE shipping policy. The shipping charge will be calculated automatically during the check-out process.

settings.title: How do I track an order placed online?
settings.subtitle:
There are three ways to check the status of your order:


Follow the link on the e-mail that we sent to you to confirm that you order has been shipped. Log into your account on our website.Click on the link Track Your Order under the title “Orders” at the bottom of any of our web pages.

settings.title: How is sales tax charged?
settings.subtitle: Sales tax on the merchandise total is charged for items shipped within the state of California ONLY. Sorry, fellow Californians, but our business resides in CA and the tax code requires us to collect the sales tax in your tax district. Shipment going to any state except for California are not subject to any sales tax.

settings.title: How long does your standard FREE shipping take?
settings.subtitle: Standard FREE shipping means Fedex Ground or United States Postal Service. Use this link to learn about the shipping time to your location.

settings.title: What type of shipping options are available?
settings.subtitle: We offer standard delivery free of charge. If you order needs to be rushed you can request that it be expedited by opting for 3rd day, 2nd day or even next day delivery. Rush shipping is at an additional charge. The extra charge is calculated real time during the checkout process. Just enter your ZIP code.

settings.title: Do you exchange products?
settings.subtitle: We handle an exchange like a return. This means the product you’d like to exchange would have to be returned for a refund. The product you have chosen instead would be a new purchase that you can do online in our store.

settings.title: How can I cancel or change an order?
settings.subtitle: Orders can only be cancelled or changed as long as they have not shipped. Please contact us at 1-888-272 0705 from 9AM to 5PM Pacific Time (MON-FRI) or send us an e-mail at info@kouboo.com to make a change or cancel your order.

settings.title: How do I return a product?
settings.subtitle: Please follow the instructions here or contact us at 1-888-272 0705 between 9AM and 5PM Pacific Time (MON-FRI) to return your product.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.subtitle:
If you are dissatisfied for any reason, you may return your purchase for a refund of the merchandise value within 30 days of purchase. Any rush shipping charges are excluded from the refund.

We cannot accept returns of final–sale items which are identified as such on the website.

For returns of items purchased with a gift card we will provide a refund of the merchandise value onto your gift card account excluding rush shipping charges if that was the chosen method of shipping at the time.

settings.title: Are your products eco-friendly?
settings.subtitle: Most of our products can be considered eco-friendly since they are made from natural, renewable materials by hand. A number of products use metal and plastic components that are not renewable. Our product assortment has not been evaluated by independent sources for its eco-friendliness.

settings.title: Do you offer a warranty on your products?
settings.subtitle: Our products carry a 1 year limited warranty from the date of purchase against defect due to material or workmanship. Wear and tear as well as damage due to unintended use is explicitly excluded from this limited warranty.

settings.title: How do I care for the product I bought?
settings.subtitle: We include a leaflet to every product giving you instructions how to best use and care for your purchase. The same information is also available at the bottom of any of our web pages under Use & Care.

settings.title: How do I submit a product rating and review?
settings.subtitle: Navigate to the product for which you would like to write a review. Click on the “Product Review” tab and you will find the link to enter a product review.

settings.title: When will my rating and review appear online?
settings.subtitle: Please give us a few days to post your review.

settings.title: Where are your products available?
settings.subtitle: Our products are exclusively available on our website. We do not have brick and mortar stores.

settings.title: Do you charge sales tax on trade sales?
settings.subtitle: Only ship-to address within California are subject to sales tax. If you wish to ship to an address in California and wish to be exempted from sales tax you will have to supply us with a signed Resale Certificate. Without such document we are forced to add sales tax to your purchase.

settings.title: How and when will I know that I have been accepted into the KOUBOO trade program?
settings.subtitle: We will send you a confirmation e-mail with all the necessary information within days of you submitting an application.

settings.title: How can I pay for my order?
settings.subtitle: We gladly accept Visa, Master, Discover and American Express as well as PayPal Express.

settings.title: How do I apply for the KOUBOO trade program?
settings.subtitle: Please fill out the application form and e-mail it to tradesales@kouboo.com or fax it to us at 949-415 7135.

settings.title: How do I place an order for which I do not request to be exempted from sales tax?
settings.subtitle: Just go to our website, select the products you like and enter the promotion code that you have received with the e-mail accepting you into the trade sale program during check-out.

settings.title: How do I place an order for which I do request to be exempted from sales tax?
settings.subtitle:
There are 2 ways to place your order:

Call us at 1-888-272 0705 between 9AM and 5PM Pacific Time (MON-FRI) with your order.Scan and e-mail us your order using this order form and your resale certificate to 949-415 7135.

settings.title: How do I track my order?
settings.subtitle: We will supply you with a tracking number once your order has been process successfully. You can also login to your account and check the status of your order there.

settings.title: What type of programs do you offer for interior designers and architects?
settings.subtitle: We offer a 15% discount on purchases for professionals who successfully registered with the necessary credentials on all products except sale items. Please check out Business/Trade Sales at the bottom of every page on our website to register and check the terms & conditions.

settings.title: What type of shipping options are available?
settings.subtitle: We offer standard delivery free of charge. If you order needs to be rushed you can request that it be expedited by opting for 3rd day, 2nd day or even next day delivery. Rush shipping is at an additional charge. The extra charge is calculated real time during the checkout process. Just enter your ZIP code.

settings.title: Do you sell or rent e-mail addresses?
settings.subtitle: Absolutely not. We do not sell or rent your e-mail address to anybody. We hate to be solicited with unwanted mails as much as you do.

settings.title: Is the credit card information I submit secured?
settings.subtitle:
We have sophisticated encryption and authentication tools to protect the security of your credit card information. Specifically, every page in the ordering process that requests credit card information uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption, which is designed to render information unreadable should anyone try to intercept it.

To help ensure others will not have access to your credit card information while on our Web site, we urge you to sign off your account and close your browser window when you have finished your visit, especially if you are sharing a computer with someone else or are using a computer in a public place.

settings.title: Woven Items (Rattan, Seagrass, Arurog, Bamboo etc.)
settings.subtitle:
Exampels: Various baskets, cachepots, tabletop, kitchen & entertaining accessories, bathroom items)

Clean with damp cloth and mild soap.Do not use bleach or abrasive cleaning tools.Do not machine wash.
Do not leave exposed to the elements.For tabletop items do not use as a trivet to rest hot cookware.

settings.title: Seashells (Capiz , Clamrose, Brownlip, Blacklip etc.)
settings.subtitle:
Examples: Tabletop, kitchen & entertaining accessories, décor like placemats, napkin rings, coasters, vases, candle holders, curtains, chimes. For chandeliers see Lighting below.

Clean with damp cloth and very mild soap.Do not machine wash.Do not use bleach or abrasive cleaning tools.Do not leave exposed to the elements (wind chimes should not be fully exposed either).For tabletop items be careful when using sharp items like knives in order to prevent scratching and do not use as a trivet to rest hot cookware.If exposed to wine, lemon, vinegar and other acid foodstuffs wipe clean promptly to avoid dulling of the surface polish.

settings.title: Wood (Teak, Acacia, Tanguile, Bamboo, Mango & Rosewood etc.)
settings.subtitle:
Examples: Bowls, servers, serve ware, chop sticks, trays, vases

Teak & Acacia

Serve ware made from Teak and Acacia wood are food safe.Hand wash with mild soap. Towel dry.Do not machine wash.Do not use abrasive cleaning tools.To maintain the beauty and integrity of the wood, oil once in a while with food oil.

settings.title: It is normal for the wood to darken a little bit over time.
settings.subtitle:
Bamboo, Mango & Tanguile

Clean with dry cloth.Do not wet.Vases made from Mango wood CANNOT take water and are for dry flowers only.

settings.title: Porcelain & Glass
settings.subtitle:
Examples: Serveware, vases, lanterns.

Serveware made from porcelain is food safe.Vasese made from porcelain can take water for fresh cut flowers.Do not machine wash.Hand wash with mild soap. Towel dry.

settings.title: Lacquerware
settings.subtitle:
Examples: Candle holders, vases, picture frames.

Vases made from laquerware CANNOT take water and are for dry flowers only.Do not place under direct sunlight.Clean with damp cloth and mild soap.Do not soak.

settings.title: Pewter
settings.subtitle:
Examples: Napkin rings, chop sticks, candle holders, vases, center pieces, bowls.

Pewter is a food safe material.Handle with care. Pewter is malleable and can deform.Do not machine wash.Clean with warm water and mild soap to maintain luster. Rinse and dry thoroughly with soft cloth.If dull clean with metal polish before using water. Polish in straight lines not circles.

settings.title: Fabric (Abaca)
settings.subtitle:
Examples: Pillow Cases

Do not hand wash, machine wash or dry clean.Clean with damp cloth.Iron at low tempertaure avoiding decoracions.

settings.title: Mirrors & Picture Frames
settings.subtitle:
Any material wood, seashell or lacquerware.

Glass or mirror can be wiped with window cleaner.Clean frame with damp, non-abrasive cloth.

settings.title: Hampers
settings.subtitle:
All hampers with removable liners.

Liners are made of cotton or a cotton-polyester blend.Liner can be machine washed warm and tumble dried low.If liner is not removable clean liner only with mild soap.

settings.title: Lighting
settings.subtitle:
Chandeliers, pendant lamps, floor lamps, table lamps.

Use clean, soft cloth to wipe metal frame, shells, lampshade and/or lamp base.Do not use higher wattage bulb than recommended on product.

settings.title: RISK of fire/injury to persons. Keep away from combustibles. Unplug to change bulb. Do not touch bulb directly.
settings.subtitle:
Chandeliers & Pendant Lamps only

Lamps must be installed in accordance with the local installation codes by a person familiar with the construction and operation of the product and the hazards involved.Consult a qualified electrician to ensure correct branch circuit conductor.Installation by qualified electrician is always recommended.All chandeliers are delicate and therefore thoroughly packaged for safe shipping. While there is no assembly required, unpacking of product requires time.

settings.title: Vases
settings.subtitle:
Mango wood, porcelain, lacquerware, fiberglass.

Vases made from lacquerware and mango wood CANNOT take water. For use with dry flowers only.Vases made from porcelain, ceramic and fiberglass can hold water for fresh cut flowers.Wipe with soft cloth. Towel dry.Do not drop item as it may break.

settings.title: Candle Holders
settings.subtitle: Keep away from children.Use on a temperature-safe surface.Allow candle holder to cool before touching or moving.

settings.title: Never leave an unattended candle burning
settings.subtitle:
Trunks

To be used for storage. KEEP SMALL CHILDREN FROM CLIMBING INTO TRUNK . Danger of suffocation.

settings.product_description: Complement your wicker bedroom furniture with handcrafted headboards – from chic and simple weaves to luxurious stand-out pieces.
Sit back and absorb the coastal feel of unique wicker chairs that provide a distinct, artistic look as well as coziness and comfort.
Bring a beachy feel into your bedroom, study, foyer or living room with Kouboo's designer-made wicker tables that will match any décor.
Add a sophisticated accent to your living area by opting for an elegant, yet functional wicker cabinet instead of any ordinary shelf.
Browse Kouboo's collection of wicker stools for comfort and appeal – plus, some of them double as elegant and handy storage baskets.
Store your clutter in handcrafted wicker storage baskets woven from rattan, bamboo, or seagrass, an easy fit into any home aesthetic.
Enjoy the timeless, neutral tones of wicker pendant lamps that work with any home décor while exuding unique character and elegance.
All your favorite wicker furniture pieces and accessories now at lower prices! Find the perfect addition to your home.
Kouboo's artisans are constantly working on design ideas for our indoor wicker furniture collection. Refine your living space with the newest additions!

settings.title: Wicker Furniture
settings.slider1_description: Unique handcrafted wicker furniture introduces comfort and elegance to any living area. Transform your interior into a coastal paradise that you can enjoy all year round!
settings.second_slider_description: Wicker patio and porch furniture and indoor wicker accents rose in popularity during the 1970s, but the use of wicker materials in outdoor and indoor wicker furniture has been around for centuries as one of the most versatile and rugged techniques. Explore this classic in today's woven furniture for the modern audience.
settings.four_description: Wicker materials are becoming increasingly popular in indoor and outdoor home design. Replicating the cozy furniture of our childhood, as well as connecting us to nature, wicker exudes this effortless warmth and comfort while being contemporary and chic. Learn about the origins of wicker and how to differentiate various types of wicker, and note ideas for your interior.
settings.section_five_title: INDOOR WICKER FURNITURE: ROOTS, TYPES, CARE
settings.section_five_first_section_content:
The origins of outdoor wicker furniture can be traced back more than 3,000 years, with a wicker chair found in King Tut’s tomb in ancient Egypt. It's a weaving technique using natural fibers such as bamboo, rattan, seagrass, and later introducing synthetic materials. Wicker reached a peak of popularity in the 19th century with the surge in rattan trade between Europe and Asia and has been widely used ever since.

The continued growth in bohemian trends has made wicker materials more widely explored. Together with advancements in all-weather wicker, outdoor wicker furniture has flourished. That being said, wicker is definitely not limited to outdoor use as patio and porch furniture. Over the years, interior designers have found ways to use wicker furniture indoors, building upon the classic style with innovative materials and unique shapes.
settings.section_five_second_section_content:
There are two main types of wicker to distinguish: natural and synthetic. Natural wicker, hand-woven by skilled artisans from natural materials, is meant to be the basis of indoor wicker furniture, whereas synthetic options, also called resin wicker and all-weather wicker, are more durable and perfectly suited for outdoors as wicker porch and patio furniture.

When it comes to the weaving of outdoor and indoor wicker furniture, the process is similar for both. The main difference is the materials. For wicker bedroom furniture and other wicker uses indoors, the materials used are usually rattan, reed, willow, bamboo, and other natural fibres. For outdoor wicker furniture, aluminum frames and synthetic, man-made fibres are used to replicate natural rattan and have improved durability against the elements.
settings.section_five_third_section_content:
There is often confusion between the terms 'wicker' and 'rattan' as many tend to think both describe the same thing. However, rattan is a material used for weaving, while wicker refers to the style of weaving and the technique itself. Wicker furniture can be made from rattan as well as various other natural or synthetic wicker materials, and all of the options would qualify as wicker due to their construction.

Rattan is a climbing palm – the poles are used as the basis of the furniture frame, while vines are cut into strands and worked into weaving material to be woven into wicker porch and patio furniture. Kouboo's wicker furniture uses the best natural rattan and is crafted by hand in Indonesia.
settings.section_five_forth_section_content:
Make sure you don't keep your wicker patio furniture outside without any protective cover 24/7. It's best to take the pieces inside and store them somewhere. This will help to protect your wicker patio chairs and the rest of the furniture set from harmful UV rays. Natural wicker materials will fade and splinter when exposed to direct sunlight for a long time.

Similarly, your white wicker outdoor furniture won't do so well in a constantly humid environment. It tends to soak up moisture, which leads to mildew and rotting. Even if it is waterproofed, don't let moisture build up, and wipe down the furniture after rainfall or exposure to other elements. Spend a bit of time to dust the wicker regularly and clean it with a damp, soft cloth to enjoy your wicker furniture for years to come.
